title: Budget 2024: What are power sector's expectations from FM Nirmala Sitharaman?
description: Budget 2024: With anticipated economic growth and a focus on energy transition, Indiaâ€™s power sector is a top priority for the government. The nation is targeting 500 GW of renewable energy by FY30 and an additional 85 GW of thermal capacities by FY32. ET examines the challenges faced by the sector and its budgetary wishlist.
